response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value and potential impact on your projects, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a discount. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 9500}
